Package org.fcrepo.server.access

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Access
    Defines the Fedora Access subsystem interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultAccess
    The Access Module, providing support for the Fedora Access subsystem.
    DescribeRepositoryServlet
    Implements the "describeRepository" functionality of the Fedora Access LITE (API-A-LITE) interface using a java servlet front end.
    DynamicAccessImpl
    The implementation of the Dynamic Access module.
    DynamicAccessModule
    Module Wrapper for DynamicAccessImpl.
    FedoraAccessServlet
    Implements the three methods GetObjectProfile, GetDissemination, and GetDatastreamDissemination of the Fedora Access LITE (API-A-LITE) interface using a java servlet front end.
    FedoraAPIAImpl  
    FedoraAPIAMTOMImpl  
    FieldSearchServlet
    REST interface for API-A's FieldSearch functionality.
    GetObjectHistoryServlet
    Implements the "getObjectHistory" functionality of the Fedora Access LITE (API-A-LITE) interface using a java servlet front end.
    ListDatastreamsServlet
    Implements listDatastreams method of Fedora Access LITE (API-A-LITE) interface using a java servlet front end.
    ListMethodsServlet
    Implements listMethods method of Fedora Access LITE (API-A-LITE) interface using a java servlet front end.
    MethodParameterResolverServlet
    This servlet accepts the result of a posted web form containing information about which method parameter values were selected for a dissemination request.
    ObjectProfile
    Data structure to contain a profile of a digital object that includes both stored information about the object and dynamic information about the object.
    RepositoryInfo
    Data structure to contain a key information about the repository.
    RISearchServlet
    RISearchServlet
    SpringAccessServlet  
    WSDLServlet
    Dynamically provides complete and accurate WSDL files for Fedora APIs.
